page.title: 13RELIGION IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: In our area we have one church,two chapels and two schoolrooms.The church is in Llan and is called {Saint Mary's {Church}.It is a {Church of Wales}.They meet once a week there.The Sunday School is every Sunday morning from ten o'clock till eleven o'clock.There is a {Methodist Chapel (Bethel)}in Bont.THey meet every Sunday.The other chapel is the{Old Chapel(Hen Gapel)} Dolfach.It is an Independent chapel and people meet there every Sunday.The Sunday School is held from two o'clock till three o'clock.There are two schoolrooms belonging to the Old Chapel at Bont and Tafolwern.They meet once a month in these rooms.Of the children in our school 27 are Independents 1 is a Methodist 19 are Church members 1 is Jewish and 26 do not attend anywhere.
